TopicTitle: Ferram aerospace research continued glitches the game by not allowing you to enter VAB, SPH or the tracking station

Articles.Content:
I installed the mod with the correct version v0.16.1.1 "Marangoni" from github page and I have copied gamedata and ships folders

My game version is 1.12.4. 

I saw some people having similar problem with no mods, but I only have this problem with this mod on. I figured out its this one since when I remove only this one the game works with no issues. Here are my files present in GameData folder:

Yes I did disable Declutter KSP debris setting.

  • Squad
  • AirplanePlus
  • Firespitter
  • VesselMover
  • B9PartSwitch
  • Mk2Expansion
  • MechJeb2
  • BurnTogether
  • 000_ClickThroughBlocker
  • PhysicsRangeExtender
  • 000_KSPBurst
  • ModularFlightIntegrator
  • CommunityResourcePack
  • FerramAerospaceResearch
  • KerbalEngineer
  • 666_ModuleManagerWatchDog.dll
  • Module Manager.4.2.2.dll
  • ModuleManager.ConfigCache
  • Some other small files that don't matter related to module manager

When the game loads and I get into my save  I see the KSP outside view and when i try to klick on the VAB/SPH/TS icon/building itself the icon darkens and nothing happens.

Is there a dependency I'm missing or something else?
